column4: is there any way to find out if this laptop: Acer Aspire 5732Z will allow ubuntu to run on it? can't find any information anywhere..
it'll probably allow you to run
the thing is, ive not bought it yet, so dont wanna buy a laptop that isnt going to work
your best is to look at some page with hardware specs on it, and see for example if linux drivers exist for all your pars like network, gfx, wireless, etc..
